name: OH! Is This Baseball??
description:
Latest Update: February 14, 2018 — version 1.0, OS X and Linux

Meet the Smokeland Alphabetics, a baseball team with no money and no players. It is up to you and General Manager Chilly Cheane to strap a team together on a shoestring budget! Draft all the staples of a good ball club: someone who can hit home runs, someone who can brawl, someone who can sing and dance, and someone who can–

Wait. Wait just a minute… Is…

Is This Baseball??

Inspired by the iconic "He Gets On Base" scene from the 2011 hit film Moneyball, this game was made in roughly 10 days for Movie Game Jam! This game can be played by anyone, from sabermetric superstars to even the most casual of baseball fans.

Controls

Mouse click to advance dialogue and draft players to your team. If you're unsure what a stat means during athlete selection, hover over the table header to reveal more information.
